Data.description: Foco em extração de dados, automação e scripts.

Tech.description: Desenvolvimento de software, web apps e infraestrutura.

Marketing.description: Estratégias de marketing digital e crescimento.

LucroRapido.description: Nicho de Ouro: Alta demanda, baixa complexidade.

templates.default:
Hello,

I have analyzed your project '{project_title}' and I see a clear path to the solution.

As a Solutions Consultant, my approach focuses on efficiency and reliability:
1. Detailed requirement analysis.
2. Robust implementation.
3. Quality assurance and handover.

Let's discuss how we can solve this quickly.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
templates.scraping:
Hello,

I am a Data Solutions Consultant specializing in automation and scraping. I can extract the required data for '{project_title}' efficiently, bypassing blocks and ensuring clean data delivery.

Tech Stack: Python, Playwright, Pandas, Excel/VBA integration.

Looking forward to optimizing your data workflow.
templates.web_dev:
Hello,

I offer a consultancy approach to your '{project_title}' project, ensuring not just clean code but a scalable solution that fits your business needs.

Stack: React, Node.js, Python, AWS.

Let's schedule a brief call to align on objectives?
